# Sidechain Declaration

Generate 220 block to enable Sidechain logic (otherwise sidechain can't be created): 
```
$ ./src/zen-cli -regtest generate 220
```

## Declare SC
```
$ ./src/zen-cli -regtest sc_create 10 "9c31622802b4f079026bc16b13f52e51c8b5230b5d8a6346814bd8d4229fbaca" 1000 "" "" "1c84ce1eeb0b59d9a0acbecc3ffd8a6b9b3148ce5ec2f54556cb4bf4e1c74e61d37cb8d33e353c1f8dd5c70bae76a6362edfc08c32e12e258e973a64de324de3e9240dce5c33e4263c5f529d7fb256dbbb364826c0ad00c1d77eb6a83d120000"
```

```
{
  "txid": "f8136e348c52c27cbede446cc2799cd7b14c3b16f6d6cd5361a6b7044953ef0c",
  "scid": "2ac103f1afba4c678ff58e1cfc4e015ebd40697518a61ae10750cd8f8d62505d"
}
```

## Apply Sidechain declaration in a Mainchain node

Create one block
```
./src/zen-cli -regtest generate 1
```

```
[
  "040816a37ce4a1b2a89c3a9421b554aade5abe1d83aaed4b28a660c7f06b88fa"
]
```
